required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2
clinical_study.official_title: A Safety Study of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2 Following a Single Subretinal Administration in The Patients of Bietti's Crystalline Dystrophy (BCD)

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary Objectives: To evaluate the safety of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2 Following a Single Subretinal Administration in The Patients of Bietti's Crystalline Dystrophy (BCD).
Secondary Objectives: To explore the efficacy of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2.

detailed_description.textblock: A Safety Study of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2 Following a Single Subretinal Administration in The Patients of Bietti's Crystalline Dystrophy (BCD)

primary_outcome.measure: the safety of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2

secondary_outcome.measure: the efficacy of The Gene Replacement Therapy by rAAV2/8-hCYP4V2.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes of functional indexes, behavioral indexes and morphological indexes

overall_official.affiliation: Vice President of Beijing Tongren Hospital
